page.title: 07COMMUNITY LINKS IN HATFIELD
page.content: Hatfield High School is linked in a number of ways: Mr Darker PTA Mr Darker is Head of Social Education and secretary of the Parent Teachers Association (PTA).The school has a very strong Parents Association whose aim is to involve the school with the community ,and raise money for the school through raffles, fairs, and dances. Other activities through Mr Darker are Spiral Youth Club (largest in Doncaster with over 300 members),and two 'Old Folks' Clubs,one for members of the local 'Derby and Joan' club ,and for any lonely old people in the area. Dancing, slide shows, games, and discussions are put on for the old people aided by fifth form pupils from the High School.
